title: Mechanical and Electrical Equipment for Buildings 11th Ed{BBS}
description:
The foremost guide to the design of environmental control systems
Updated and expanded

For more than seven decades, Mechanical and Electrical Equipment for Buildings has been the preeminent teaching and practice reference for building environmental control systems.
